data.name: World of Warplanes -Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

Have you just started your way in World of Warplanes? Take a look at this special DLC with Henschel Hs 123, a Tier II German attack aircraft. This special plane is perfect both for attacking ground targets and intense aerial combat.
Together with this warbird you get sets of premium consumables, ammunition and equipment.

Starter Bundle DLC Content:

  • Henschel Hs 123: German Tier II attack aircraft with two 7,92-mm machine guns, four bombs and a set of characteristics which are quite unique for an attack aircraft. Hs 123 is durable and resistant to critical damage and fire, but, at the same time, this aircraft has good maneuverability and is always ready to destroy any enemy aircraft.
  • Hangar slot: allows you to put your warbird in the Hangar.
  • X25 Incendiary Ammunition: maximizes chances of causing fire and increases chances of inflicting critical damage.
  • X25 High-Explosive Armor-Piercing Ammunition: increases chances of causing fire and damage when firing at ground targets.
  • x10 First Aid Dressing Package: heals injured crew members.
  • x10 Emergency Control System: restores controllability of wings and tail.
  • x1 Cockpit Armor Period 1: increases crew members’ resistance to injuries and slightly decreases maneuverability.
  • x10 Fire Extinguisher: extinguishes fire.
  • x1 Stock Bombsight Period 1: increases bombing accuracy and slightly decreases bomb reload speed.

This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

This special plane is perfect both for attacking ground targets and intense aerial combat. Together with this warbird you get sets of premium consumables, ammunition and equipment.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish*, Portuguese, Romanian, Turkish, Finnish, Czech*, Swedish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2xxx or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2ххх, AMD FX 8xxx / higher Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 1GB, Radeon HD 7870 / higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
